org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class TooltipBodyItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.TooltipBodyItem

  • public final class TooltipBodyItem
extends JavaScriptObjectContainer
    This object is passed by CHART.JS to the callback to manage tooltip body.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
